Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes the dormitory authority to provide financing to the Dutchess Community College Association, Inc. for the construction of facilities
Summary: Authorizes the dormitory authority to provide financing to the Dutchess Community College Association, Inc. for the construction of facilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the dormitory authority to provide financing to Dutchess Community College Association, Inc. for the construction of facilities
